Greeting.answer: Hello! I am a support bot. Can I help you?

questions: How to get a job with you?
I want to work for you
Job search.answer: If you want to join us, please email game-of-verbs@gmail.com with a mini-essay about yourself and attach your portfolio.

questions: I do not remember the password
Password.answer: If you can't log in to the site, use the 'Forgot your password' button. You will receive an email with further instructions. Check your spam folder, sometimes emails end up there.

questions: I want to delete my account
Account removal.answer: If you want to delete your account, you can do so in your profile 'Settings' section. Scroll through this section to the area highlighted in red.

questions: Is it possible to buy unban?
Ban.answer: If you are banned, you have violated our community rules. When you enter the site, you can see evidence of your violations and a link to the violated rule. The unban is not for sale. If you have read the rules and evidence of your guilt and you still have complaints, use the 'Not Guilty' form under the ban message.
